Near_05: Is that going to fall over?
talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hear it's valuable, so I'm not going to
touch it.

But it looks like it could go toppling over
at any moment, so please be careful.
Talk_03:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>So those balloon things that fell from the sky are
called <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>...

There's still so much we don't know about them.


But trust my boss, Purah, to take a thing we know so
little about and turn it into something useful. She's
the sharpest person in Hyruleâ€”a creative genius!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_10:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Turns out this giant thing has inscriptions on it that
are valuable to archaeological research... And that
lady from the Zonai Survey Team is right there.
Glad she doesn't know I intended to demolish it.
I mean, it's huge. It takes up so much space...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Near_07: I don't want to get wet.
talk_29:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sleep>President Hudson... Can I go back to
Tarrey Town soon?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Whenever it rains, the walls get slick,
which can be dangerous. It's a real pain
for us carpenters.
So be careful, will you?<sp:5:1:0>


Although, it's not like you're going to be
climbing all over the walls or anything, ha.
Talk_2_2:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_00>So there was a path after all.


I figured if this is the royal family's emergency
shelter, there would be a path that leads to here.

So if you follow it, then...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm? Did you come to see the <clr:0000>tablet<clr:ffff>?
talk_07:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Chat_00>That Wortsworth guy is a bigwig with the Zonai
Survey Team...<sp:5:0:0>isn't he? Surprised he came all
the way out here.
Guess that means this <clr:0000>stone tablet<clr:ffff> is something
worth looking into...

Close call.<sp:5:0:0> I was just about to demolish it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I won't be letting anyone know I was just about to up
and demo that thing.

I mean, it was in the way. Any longer and I'd have
split it clean in two...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk_37:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I usually just mind my business,<sp:5:1:0> but hearing that the
princess might have been found is exciting!

I have to get a look!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_09:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>That bigwig? Wortsworth?<sp:5:0:0> He was looking at the
<clr:0000>stone tablet <clr:ffff>in the base of this thing before taking
off for <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
It would've been nice if he had just taken this
massive obstruction with him though...

<snd:Think_00>If it falls down, it'll be dangerous. <sp:5:0:0>Plus, it's in the
way, so I want to demo it.

But that lady from the Zonai Survey Team is standing
watch. <sp:5:0:0>If I mess with it, she'll probably send me
soaring straight into Death Mountain.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_2_5:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>How odd...<sp:5:0:0> This place was the royal family's
shelter, so they'd probably have a hidden
pathway. <sp:5:0:0>Even so...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_16: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Whew!<sp:5:0:0> The rain sure is chilly, huh?
Talk_2_6:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I bet it's deteriorated pretty badly in there... Just
strolling on in is probably a bad idea.

Still, I'm dying to know if it leads to where I think
it does.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_2_7:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>If this place is the royal family's emergency shelter,
then it would make sense for them to have a
secret corridor.
But maybe I miscalculated something...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
